hvtools

Class HVFrameList

  • java.lang.Object
    • hvtools.Parameters
      • hvtools.HVFrameList

  • public class HVFrameList
extends Parameters
    Implements methods to manipulate with list of hvframe hostnames
    Version:
    2.1 Last update: 24-Apr-2014 Mod&Add: 27-Feb-2002 add methods getToken() and regionMatches() Mod&Add: 24-Apr-2014 add property 'server.port' to change default ServerPort=5555 add methods getServerPort(), setServerPort(port) add constructor HVFrameList(String infile)

      • insertHostName

        public void insertHostName(int ind,
                           java.lang.String host)
        Inserts the specified hostname as a component in hostnameList at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        ind - int index where to insert the new component.
        host - String the hostname to insert.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String host)
        Tests if the specified host is a component in hostnameList.
        Parameters:
        host - String hostname of tested
        Returns:
        true if and only if the specified object is the same as a component in hostnameList, false otherwise.

      • regionMatches

        public boolean regionMatches(java.lang.String host)
        Tests if the specified host is a component in hostnameList.
        Parameters:
        host - String hostname of tested
        Returns:
        true if and only if the specified object is match region of a component in hostnameList, false otherwise.

      • removeHostName

        public void removeHostName(java.lang.String host)
        Removes the first occurrence of the specified element in hostnameList. If the hostnameList does not contain the element, it is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        host - String hostname to remove.

      • removeByindex

        public void removeByindex(int indx)
        Removes the element at the specified position in hostnameList. Decrement number of hostname in propery nFrame by 1
        Parameters:
        ind - int the index of the hostname to removed.
